A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After watching Episode I the first time\, I thought it would get better if I watched it again. It never did. Each viewing uncovered new pieces of the train wreck. With The Last Jedi\, it was apparent off the bat that it was bad. This film ranks with the prequels. Outside of bad writing/storytelling/plotting/dialogue\, it looks low budget\, actors look out of shape\, and worst of all it touches on core Star Wars lore with its brush of mediocrity.
